translation.Message_0_Page_0: My name is <name_npc>. I'm an engineer and a gunsmith.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: I repair and maintain the <color=legendary>Maelstrom</color> attack boat.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: I'll buy tools from you, sell you replacement blueprints, and make you weapons.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Thanks to you, I'm a gunsmith and have plenty of weapon blueprints.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: My name is <name_npc>. I'm an engineer.
translation.Message_1_Page_1: I repair and maintain the <color=legendary>Maelstrom</color> attack boat.
translation.Message_1_Page_2: I doubt you will do it, but I need some tools and will buy them from you.
translation.Message_1_Page_3: I'm currently trying to learn to become a gunsmith.
